gcEmptyPhotoCaption: This surrogate hasn't uploaded any photos yet
mAddrCheck: Mailing Address Same With Physical Address
ipDisclaimer: The Purpose of this Full application for Intended Parents is to match the ideal surrogate for you. Please be as descriptive and open as possible and provide insight into your personality, hobbies and expectations of surrogacy. Patriot Conceptions will share this application with potential suitable surrogate mothers.
ipEggsForEmbl: Who will be providing eggs for the embryos?
ipSpermForEmbl: Who will be providing sperm for the embryos?
ipFrozenEmbl: Do you already have frozen embryos?
ipFrozenEmbHowManyl: If so, how many embryos are frozen?
ipPastSurrogatel: Have you participated in a Surrogate Arrangement in the past?
ipPlanOnPgdPgsEmbtestl: Did you or do you plan on doing PGD/PGS, genetic embryo testing?
ipBabyGenderl: Do you have a preference on the gender of your baby?
ipAttemptPregnancyDuringSurrogacyl: Do you plan to attempt a pregnancy yourself through IVF at the same time as your surrogate?
ipWorkingWithFertilityClinicl: Are you currently working with a fertility clinic?
ipSelectiveReductionl: If a twin or triplet pregnancy were to occur, would you want selective reduction performed?
ipIdenticalTwinl: If a single embryo is transferred and should split into an identical twin pregnancy, would you choose to have your surrogate continue with the identical twin pregnancy?
ipFetusAbnormalitiesl: If it was determined that the fetus had abnormalities, would you abort the pregnancy?
ipMotherConceiveYearsl: Number of years trying to conceive
ipMotherPregnancyAttemptHealthDamagel: Have you been advised that trying to get pregnant could be damaging to your health?
ipMotherInfertilityTreatmentl: Have you ever gone through any infertility treatment or procedures in the past?
ipMotherCurrentTreatmentl: Are you currently receiving treatment for any medical conditions or problems?
ipMotherCurrentMedicationl: Are you currently taking any prescription medication?
ipMotherTransmittedDiseasesl: Past or present, do you have or have had any of the following transmitted diseases?
ipSurrogatePregnancyContactl: What type of contact would you expect to have with your Surrogate during the pregnancy?
ipSurrogateDeliveryContactl: What type of contact would you expect to have with the Surrogate, after the delivery?
ipAttendSurrogateAppointmentsl: Do you plan to attend the pregnancy (OB/GYN) appointments with your Surrogate?
ipAttendDeliveryl: If medically possible would you like to be in the delivery room during the birth?
ipSurrogacyDeliveryPhotosl: If you cannot make it in time for the birth, would you like photos taken?
ipSendPhotosOfBabiesl: Would you consider sending occasional photos of the child or children to the Surrogate?
ipFatherInfertilityTreatmentl: Have you ever gone through any infertility treatment or procedures in the past?
ipFatherCurrentTreatmentl: Are you currently receiving treatment for any medical conditions or problems?
ipFatherCurrentMedicationl: Are you currently taking any prescription medication?
ipFatherTransmittedDiseasesl: Past or present, do you have or have had any of the following transmitted diseases?
ipPhotosInstruction: Please upload at least 5 photos of the intended parents. Family-oriented photos are preferred.
ipSignatureDisclaimer: By signing below, I swear or affirm that the above and foregoing representations are true and correct to the best of my information, knowledge, and belief.
ipInfoDisclaimer: Information on this page will only serve as record keeping purpose, we will NOT disclose or share any information on this page with surrogates or public.
ipMotherIncomel: What is your approx. annual income?
ipMotherChkboxl: Mailing Address Same As Physical Address
ipMotherHearAboutUsl: How did you hear about us?
ipMotherPhotoIDl: Please upload your photo ID (Passport/Driver License...)
ipFatherIncomel: What is your approx. annual income?
ipFatherChkboxl: Mailing Address Same As Physical Address
ipFatherHearAboutUsl: How did you hear about us?
ipFatherPhotoIDl: Please upload your photo ID (Passport/Driver License...)
ipReferFertilityClinicl: Would you like our office to refer you to a fertility clinic?
ipProfessionalsToWorkWithl: Please list the names of any professionals whom you have already elected to work with during this arrangement?
title1Fa: Thanks for your compassion and interest in becoming a surrogate mother. This brief intake form will help us make a quick decision on whether you meet the basic requirements to become a surrogate mother. Upon satisfactory finding, an intake specialist will reach out to you and discuss the surrogacy process in detail.
miscarriagesReasonFal: Please specify a brief reason, if any miscarriages
medicationDAFal: Have you ever taken medications for depression or anxiety?
medicationListFal: Please provide your current medication list:
abnormalPapSmearFal: Have you had an abnormal pap smear within the last 3 years?
familySupportFbl: Do your family members support your decision?
surrogateTimesFbl: How many times you have been a surrogate before?
peopleAroundFbl: How many people live with you currently and what relationship?
languagesFbl: What languages do you or your family speak?
localAppointmentsFbl: Are you able to attend all local appointments?
parentingChildFbl: Are you currently parenting at least one of your own children?
weeks36Fcl: Deliver less than 36 weeks on any pregnancy?
abortionFcl: Have you ever had an abortion, elective or otherwise?
miscarriageFcl: Have you ever had a miscarriage?
isFirstFcl: Was this pregnancy for yourself or a surrogacy journey?
mInsuranceFdl: What is your current Medical Insurance Company?
hepatitisBFdl: Have you had the Hepatitis B Vaccine (Are you Hepatitis B Immune)? When?
varicellaFdl: Have you had the Varicella Vaccine (Are you Varicella Immune)? When?
periodDateFdl: What is your last period start date?
rCycleFdl: Do you have regular monthly menstrual cycles?
daysNPFdl: How many days you have between periods?
birthControlFdl: What is your current birth control method?
infectiousDFdl: Do you suffer from any infectious disease in the past 3 years?
geneticDFdl: Do you suffer from any genetic disease in the past 3 years?
mentalDFdl: Do you currently or have you ever in the previous three years experienced any form of mental illness, such as anxiety, depression or bipolar disorder?
medicalCFdl: Do you currently suffer from any medical conditions, such as diabetes, obesity or hypertension?
medicationsFdl: Are you currently taking any medications?
allergicFdl: Are you allergic to any medication?
weightCFdl: Have you had a significant change in weight during the past five years that wasn't caused by pregnancy?
surgeriesFdl: Have ever had any hospitalizations, surgeries, or plastic surgeries?
twinsFdl: Are there twins or triplets in your family?
gcB4Fdl: Have you ever donated eggs or served as a surrogate? If yes, how many times?
biologicalFdl: How many biological children do you have?
withCFdl: Do all of your children presently reside with you?
custodyFdl: Do you have legal custody of your children?
moreCFdl: Do you plan on having more children of your own?
prescriptionFdl: Have you ever been prescribed any medications in the last 5 years? if yes please explain:
surgeriesLFdl: Have you had any surgeries? If yes, please list all reasons for surgery and month/year of surgery:
uDFdl: Have you ever been diagnosed with the following diseases?
husbandDFdl: Have you, your husband or partner or any past sexual partners ever been diagnosed with the following? Please check all applied:
surrogateMFel: Have you been a surrogate mother in the past?
beginTFel: How soon would you like to begin your Surrogacy journey?
otherAFel: Have you ever applied to other agencies as a surrogate or egg donor?
embryosNFel: What is the maximum number of embryos you are willing to have transferred to you at each appointment?
babiesNFel: What is the maximum number of babies you are willing to carry for the journey?
twinsWFel: Are you willing to carry twins?
srpFel: If a multiple pregnancy is confirmed, would you undergo a selective reduction procedure based on the advice of the physicians?
decisionMFel: If there is a medical problem with the pregnancy, or with the child you are carrying as a surrogate and the Intended Parents want to consider abortion, would you allow them to make that decision based on the advice of their physicians and personal beliefs?
cvsFel: Would you agree to undergo an amniocentesis or CVS if the physician or the Intended Parents request one?
injectionsFel: Are you comfortable with injections and taking oral medication for surrogacy?
meetIPFel: Would you like to meet the intended parents?
drIPFel: At the birth of the baby, are you comfortable with your IPs being in the delivery room?
signDocFel: Would you agree to sign necessary legal documents to assure the intended parents that you will relinquish all your parental rights to their child?
supportGFel: What is your primary support group during your journey?
yIPFel: Why do you want to be a surrogate?
relationshipIPFel: What relationship do you want with the Intended Parents during conception and pregnancy?
rIPafterBFel: What kind of relationship do you want to have with Intended Parents after the birth, if any?
workWFel: Are you willing to work with a gay couple or single parent?
ncIPFel: Are there any Intended Parent types you are not comfortable with?
milkFel: Are you willing to pump breast milk if the Intended Parents want this?
understandXFel: Do you and your partner understand that, unless you have had a tubal ligation or your partner has had a vasectomy,you must agree to abstain from sexual activity while undergoing hormonal treatment embryo transfer? THIS DOES NOT MEAN ANY SEX FOR THE ENTIRE SURROGACY.During the term of your Surrogacy Contract any sexual activity with your Spouse/Partner must be with approval of your Treating Physician.
fSupportFel: Do you have surrounding family and do you have their support in this matter? Please provide some detail for the Intended Parents, so they know you have a supporting and loving environment.
rcQualityFel: What qualities would you consider most important in choosing a Recipient Couple?
share2IPFel: Is there anything you would like to share with the Intended Parents about you?
hearFel: How did you hear about us?
otherSmokeFfl: Do you have anyone in your household smoke?
driverLicenseFfl: Do you own a valid driver license?
carFfl: Do you own a car or have reliable transportation?
criminalFfl: Do you have any criminal records?
gvAidFfl: Are you currently receiving government aid?
tattoosFfl: Have you received any tattoos in the last year?
piercingsFfl: Have you received any piercings in the last year?
filedFfl: Have you ever filed for bankruptcy?
bTransfusionFfl: Have you ever had a blood transfusion?
travelFfl: Are you able to travel out of state for 2-3 days? If travel expenses including childcare and lost wages are reimbursed?
investigatedFfl: Have you or your partner ever been investigated by governmental child protective agency?
psycCounselingFfl: Have you or your partner if applicable ever had psychological counseling?
psychMediFfl: Have you ever been prescribed any psychiatric medications (including anti-depressants and anti-anxiety medications)?
drugetcFfl: Have you ever been diagnosed with any of the following? drug or alcohol addiction, an eating disorder, schizophrenia, depression, nervous breakdown, bi-polar disorder, personality disorder, anxiety?
psycCareFfl: Have you ever been hospitalized for psychiatric care?
pCasesFfl: Do you or your partner currently have any legal cases or claims pending? If yes, please explain
lawsuitFfl: Have you or your partner ever been involved in any lawsuit? (If YES please explain)
illicitFfl: Have you ever used illicit drugs (marijuana, cocaine, methamphetamines)? when was the last time? (please note that you will be tested)?
arrestedFfl: Have you or your partner ever been arrested (including DUI arrests, please explain if yes and date)?
hobbiesFfl: Describe your hobbies, interests and talents.
spareTFfl: What do you like to do in your spare time?
tellCFfl: What do you plan to tell your children about you being a Surrogate?
routineFfl: What does your daily routine consist of?
funFfl: What do you do for fun?
familySTFfl: What is your favorite way to spend time with your family?
dessertFfl: What is your favorite dessert, candy or snack food?
movieFfl: What is your favorite Movie or TV show?
relaxFfl: What is your favorite way to relax?
jewelryFfl: Favorite type of jewelry? I.E. rings, necklaces, or bracelets?)
hInsuranceFhl: Do you have a current health care insurance policy?
insuranceCardFFhl: Please upload your health insurance card(front side), if any
insuranceCardBFhl: Please upload your health insurance card(back side), if any
contentFh1: By signing below, I swear or affirm that the above and foregoing representations are true and correct to the best of my information, knowledge, and belief.
contentFh2: Please be aware that NO information on the page will be shared with intended parents or other third parties. This page is only for administrative purposes and to help you along the way.
contentFh3: If any of the information below needs to be changed during your journey, please send an updated version to intake@patriotconceptions.com promptly.
oPortalFil: Do you have an online portal for your doctor and hospital?
hospitalNameFil: Delivery hospital name (prenatal and delivery records)
authFil: I authorize and request the disclosure of all protected information for the purpose of review and evaluation in connection with a surrogacy eligibility evaluation by Patriot Conceptions, LLC. I expressly request that the designated record custodian of all covered entities under HIPAA identified above disclose full and complete protected medical information including the following:
signatureFil: Signature of Patient or Legally Authorized Representative
representativeFil: Name and Relationship of Legally Authorized Representative to Patient
contentFi1:
All surrogates MUST complete this form in order for Patriot Conceptions to obtain OB/GYN, prenatal, labor and delivery medical records for all previous pregnancies including miscarriages and abortions. (Todas las madres sustitutas DEBEN completar esta forma para que de esta manera 'Patriot Conceptions' pueda obteber informaciÃ³n del ginecÃ³logo/a, embarazos previos, rÃ©cords de embarazos y partos incluyendo pÃ©rdidas del feto y abortos)
Please note that your match cannot proceed until Patriot Conceptions has obtained your medical records related to your previous pregnancies. (Por favor tenga en cuenta que su emparejamiento con los futuros padres no procederÃ¡ hasta que 'Patriot Conceptions' haya obtenido los rÃ©cords medicos relacionados con sus embarazos anteriores.)
addressFi:
Patriot Conceptions, Attn: Medical Records
695 Town Center Dr, Suite 1200,
Costa Mesa, CA 92626
Phone: (888) 807-1126  Fax: (888) 807-1126
Email: intake@patriotconceptions.com
subtitleFi2: INFORMATION TO BE RELEASED/ INFORMACION QUE SERÃ REQUIRIDA

contentFi3: â¢ Records to disclose: Most current pap and STI results/ RÃ©cords divulgados: MÃ¡s reciente pap y resultados del STI
contentFi4:
I understand the information to be released or disclosed may include information relating to sexually transmitted diseases, acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS), or human Page 1 of 2 immunodeficiency virus (HIV), and alcohol and drug abuse. I authorize the release or disclosure of this type of information. This protected health information is disclosed for the following purposes (Entiendo que la informaciÃ³n a ser divulgada puede incluir informaciÃ³n relacionada a enfermedades de trasmisiÃ³n sexual, sindrome de deficiendia inmunolÃ³gica (SIDA), o VIH, y abuso de alcohol y drogas. Autorizo a que se entregue y divulgue todo este tipo de informaciÃ³n. Este tipo de protegido de imformaciÃ³n mÃ©dica es divulgada para los siguientes propÃ³sitos):
Gestational carrier eligibility evaluation (EvaluaciÃ³n para elegibilidad gestacional)
 
This authorization is given in compliance with the federal consent requirements for release of alcohol or substance abuse records of 42 CFR 2.31, the restrictions of which have been specifically considered and expressly waived. (Esta autorizaciÃ³n se da en cumplimiento con los requisitos de consentimiento federal para la divulgaciÃ³n de abuso de alcohol u otras substancias documentadas en 42 CFR 2.31, las restricciones las cuales estÃ¡n especÃ­ficamente consideradas y expresamente a las que se renuncia)
 
I understand the following: See CFR Â§164.508(c)(2)(i-iii) [Entiendo lo siguiente]:
a. I have a right to revoke this authorization in writing at any time, except to the extent information has been released in reliance upon this authorization. (Tengo el derecho de revocar esta autorizaciÃ³n por escrito en cualquier momento, excepto cuando la informaciÃ³n ha sido divulgada al firmar esta autorizaciÃ³n)
b. The information released in response to this authorization may be re-disclosed to other parties. (La informaciÃ³n divulgada en respuesta a esta autorizaciÃ³n puede ser re-divulgada a terceros)  c. My treatment or payment for my treatment cannot be conditioned on the signing of this authorization. Any facsimile, copy or photocopy of the authorization shall authorize you to release the records requested herein. This authorization shall be in force and effect until two years from date of execution at which time this authorization expires. (Mi tratamiento o pago por mi tratamiento no puede ser condicionado a la firma autorizando este documento. Cualquier fax, copia o fotocopia de esta autorizaciÃ³n debe autorizarla a usted a divulgar los rÃ©cords requeridos aquÃ­. Esta autorizaciÃ³n debe estar vigente y en efecto hasta dos aÃ±os despuÃ©s de la fecha de ejecuciÃ³n).
agreeFjl: Notice to California, Minnesota and Oklahoma Residents: Please check the box below if you wish to receive a copy of a consumer report that is requested. (Aviso a residentes de California, Minnesota y Oklahoma: Por favor marque el cuandro si usted desea recibir una copia del reporte del consumidor que sea requerido.)
checkFj: I wish to receive a copy of any Background Check Report on me that is requested. [Deseo recibir una copia de cualquier Reporte de DivulgaciÃ³n de Antecedentes Penales de mi que se haya pedido.]
contentFj1:
The information contained in this application is correct to the best of my knowledge. (La informaciÃ³n contenida en esta aplicaciÃ³n es correcta dentro de lo mejor de mi conocimiento y entendimiento.)          
I hereby authorize    Patriot Conceptions, LLC    and its designated agents and representatives to conduct a comprehensive review of my background causing a consumer report and/or an investigative consumer report to be generated for employment and/or volunteer purposes.  I understand that the scope of the consumer report/ investigative consumer report may include, but is not limited to the following areas: verification of social security number; credit reports, current and previous residences; employment history, education background, character references; drug testing, civil and criminal history records from any criminal justice agency in any or all federal, state, county jurisdictions; driving records, birth records, and any other public records.  (Autorizo a 'Patriot Conceptions, LLC y sus designados agentes y representates a conducir un repaso comprensivo de mis antecedentes causando que un reporte del consumidor y/o reporte del consumidor investigativo sea generado para empleo y/o trabajo de voluntario. Entiendo que el alcance del reporte del consumidor/reporte investigativo del consuidor pueda incluir, pero no es limitado a las siguientes Ã¡reas: verificaciÃ³n del nÃºmero de seguro social, reportes de crÃ©dito, direcciones previas y actuales; historial de empleo, historial educacional, referencias de carÃ¡cter, exÃ¡menes de drogas, antecedentes civiles y penales de cuaquier agencia de justicia ya sea federal, estatal, juricdiciones del condado; rÃ©cords de conducir, rÃ©cords de nacimiento, y cualquier otros rÃ©cords pÃºblicos. )
 
I further authorize any individual, company, firm, corporation, or public agency to divulge any and all information, verbal or written, pertaining to me, to    Patriot Conceptions, LLC    or its agents.  I further authorize the complete release of any records or data pertaining to me which the individual, company, firm, corporation, or public agency may have, to include information or data received from other sources.    Patriot Conceptions, LLC    and its designated agents and representatives shall maintain all information received from this authorization in a confidential manner in order to protect the applicants personal information, including, but not limited to, addresses, social security numbers, and dates of birth. (AdemÃ¡s, tambiÃ©n autorizo a cualquier individio, compaÃ±Ã­a, firma, corporaciÃ³n, o agencia pÃºblica a divulgar cuaquier informaciÃ³n, ya sea verbal o esctrita, perteneciente a mÃ­ a 'Patriot Conceptions, LLC' o sus agentes. TambiÃ©n autorizo la completa divulgaciÃ³n de cualquier rÃ©cord o dato perteneciente a mÃ­ el cual el individuo, la compaÃ±Ã­a, firma, corporaciÃ³n,o agencia pÃºblica pueda tener, incluyendo la informaciÃ³n o datos recibidos por terceros. 'Patriot Conceptions LLC' y sus agentes designados y representates deben manterner toda informaciÃ³n recibida de esta autorizaciÃ³n de una manera confidencial para poder proteger la informaciÃ³n personal del aplicante, incluyendo, pero no siendo limitada a, direcciones, nÃºmeros de seguro social, y fechas de nacimiento.)
authO1: All medical records, meaning every page in my record, including but not limited to: office notes, face sheets, history and physical, consultation notes, inpatient, outpatient and emergency room treatment, all clinical charts, reports, order sheets, progress notes, nurse's notes, social worker records, clinic records, treatment plans, admission records, discharge summaries, requests for and reports of consultations, documents, correspondence, test results, statements, questionnaires/histories, correspondence, photographs, videotapes, telephone messages, and records received by other medical providers.
authO2: All physical, occupational and rehab requests, consultations and progress notes.
authO3: All disability, Medicaid or Medicare records including claim forms and record of denial of benefits.
authO4: All autopsy, laboratory, histology, cytology, pathology, immunohistochemistry records and specimens; radiology records and films including CT scan, MRI, MRA, EMG, bone scan, myleogram; nerve conduction study, echocardiogram and cardiac catheterization results, videos/CDs/films/reels and reports.
authO5: All pharmacy/prescription records including NDC numbers and drug information handouts/monographs.
finishedNpassNoti: Thanks for filling.Our staff will be notified by the form soon.
anonyGCNotPassNoti:
Sorry. You are not eligible to become a surrogate at this moment.
Surrogates must be between the age of 21 and 38, have at least 1 previous pregnancy history, and have a BMI under 35.
If you have any other questions, please contact our office at (888) 807-1126
anonyGCPassNoti:
Congratulations! You are eligible to becoming a surrogate mother.
Please create an account for the Patriot Conceptions Application Portal to manage and continue your application.
anonyGCFinishNoti:
Thank you!
You will now be redirected to the Patriot Conceptions Application Portal.

If the new window doesn't pop up, you can click the button below to open it.
edFormIntro: To apply, please take about 5 minutes to fill out the information below.
bioEDFbh: Please tell us all about the monumental moments of your life, briefly :)
motivationEDFbl: Why do you want to be an egg donor?
motivationEDFbh: Please tell us why you want to be an egg donor
smokeRecentlyEDFcl: Have you smoked Cigarettes in the past 3 months?
nicotineTestEDFcl: Are you willing to take a nicotine screening test?
drinkOftenEDFcl: Do you drink more than once a week?
medicalProblemsEDFcl: Do you have any medical problems? If so, please explain in detail
collegeStudentEDFcl: Are you currently a college student?
experiencedEDFdl: Have you been an egg donor before?
relationshipWithRecipientEDFdl: What kind of relationship would you like to have with the recipient family
abnormalPapSmearEDFdl: Have you ever had an abnormal pap smear?
lastPapSmearEDFdl: When was your last pap smear?
chlamydiaEDFdl: Have you or your partner tested positive for Chlamydia in the past 24 months?
gonorrheaEDFdl: Have you or your partner tested positive for Gonorrhea in the past 24 months?
syphilisEDFdl: Have you or your partner tested positive for Syphilis in the past 24 months?
drugTestEDFdl: Are you willing to take a drug test?
pregnantOrBreastFeedingEDFdl: Are you currently pregnant or breast feeding?
recentTattooEDFdl: Have you received a tattoo in the past 12 months?
recentMalariaVacCountryTravelEDFdl: Have you traveled to a country in the past 24 months where you were advised / required to receive a malaria vaccine?
recentPiercingEDFdl: Have you received a piercing in the past 12 months?
recentTravelIraqEDFdl: Have you traveled to Iraq in the past 12 months?
travelHistory0EDFel: Have you lived in or visited any of the following countries for 3 or more months between 1980 and 1996? * Channel Islands, England, Falkland Islands, Gibraltar, Isle of Man, Northern Ireland, Scotland or Wales
nativeAmericanEDFel: Are you or any of your biological family members registered with any Native American tribes?
militaryEDFel: Are you currently enlisted in the Military?
plasticSurgeryEDFel: Have you ever had plastic surgery before?
illegalDrugsEDFel: Have you ever used any illegal drugs before?
criminalRecordEDFel: Do you have any legal dispute or criminal record?
previousArrestEDFel: Have you ever been arrested before?
antidepressantsEDFel: Have you ever used any anti-depression medication before?
currentMedicationEDFel: Are you currently taking any medication?
admittedToHospitalEDFel: Have you ever been admitted to the hospital?
surgeryEDFfl: Have you ever had any surgery before?
majorIllnessEDFfl: Do you have any major illness?
bloodTransfusionEDFfl: Have you ever had blood transfusion before?
organTransplantEDFfl: Have you ever had organ transplant before?
